Q_DESC:
George was interested in finding a perfect number. His Teacher told that a perfect number is a positive integer that is equal to the sum of its proper positive divisors excluding the number itself. Equivalently ,a perfect number is a number that is half  the sum of all its positive divisors. Guide George in writing a code to find whether the number is perfect number or not.
Input an integer to find whether the number is perfect number or not.
Output:
Display whether the number is perfect number or not.
